query.select_one_tb_net_device: SELECT NET_CODE,NET_DESC,NET_STATUS,NET_LASTUPDATE,NET_IP,NET_MAC,NET_CREDENTIAL FROM TB_NET_DEVICE WHERE NET_CODE LIKE '%s';
query.update_tb_net_device: UPDATE TB_NET_DEVICE SET NET_CODE = '%s', NET_TYPE = '%s',NET_STATUS = '%s',NET_IP = '%s',NET_MAC_INFO = '%s' WHERE NET_MAC =='%s');
query.select_last_tb_net_com: SELECT REQ_ID,REQ_NODE,REQ_CMD,REQ_RESPONSE,REQ_RESULT,REQ_DATETIME FROM TB_NET_COM ORDER BY REQ_ID DESC LIMIT 1;
query.select_tb_net_diz_cmd: SELECT TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_CODE,TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_TYPE, TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_IP, TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_MAC, TB_NET_DIZ_CMD.CMD_STR, TB_NET_DIZ_CMD.CMD_RESULT, TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_USER, TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_PSW FROM TB_NET_DEVICE INNER JOIN TB_NET_DIZ_CMD ON TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_TYPE = TB_NET_DIZ_CMD.CMD_NET_TYPE WHERE TB_NET_DEVICE.NET_CODE LIKE '%s' AND TB_NET_DIZ_CMD.CMD_STR LIKE '%s'
query.update_state_from_ip_tb_net_device: UPDATE TB_NET_DEVICE SET NET_STATUS = '%s' WHERE NET_IP LIKE '%s';
query.select_one_tb_res_decode: SELECT RES_RESULT, RES_STATE FROM TB_RES_DECODE WHERE RES_DEVICE_TYPE LIKE '%s' AND RES_DEVICE_SUBTYPE LIKE '%s' AND RES_COMMAND LIKE '%s' AND RES_LANG LIKE '%s' AND RES_VALUE == %s ;
